instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3787: What is 820-3787? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> does not see ssd in start up
threads.message:
Got in an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>.  It boots into my external drive. it does not see the ssd in the start up.  If i open disk utility's it show the ssd. I have tried multiple ssd's.  i also dont believe the wifi is working. Any Suggestions? 
Thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> does not see ssd in start up
threads.message:
Is the original SSD worked before in the same board?
I asked because of possible APFS issue.
In such case, do fresh install of HS, or Mojave; this will update BIOS to support APFS.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> does not see ssd in start up
threads.message:
Yeah it was an APFS issue, all was fixed with a quick re install. 
Thanks Again
